page.title: 15Village Sporting Activities
page.content: Hellifield's sporting interests include football, cricket, netball and trotting races. {Hellifield Football Club}plays in the Craven League, Division 2. Their ground is at the top of Haw Grove. The second team had to be disbanded due to lack of support in 1984. {Hellifield Green Cricket Club}plays 'friendly matches' with other teams who want a challenge. In 1985 they had their first cricket tour to Northumberland. {The Netball Club}plays in the Craven League. Home fixtures are played at Settle High School. They field successful'A' and 'B'teams. {Trotting}is a popular annual event held in Peel Park. Large crowds gather from afar to enjoy both the meeting and the social event in The Black Horse afterwards.
